Package game.items.weapons

Class Uchigatana

java.lang.Object
game.engine.items.Item
game.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
game.items.weapons.Uchigatana
All Implemented Interfaces:
game.engine.capabilities.Capable, game.engine.displays.Printable, game.engine.weapons.Weapon, Purchasable, Sellable
public class Uchigatana
extends game.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
implements Purchasable, Sellable
Uchigatana is a weapon that can be purchased and sold from MerchantKale 115 damage and 80% hit rate
Author:
Ziheng Liao Modified by: Harshath Muruganantham
See Also:
WeaponItem, Sellable, Purchasable
